title: 110_hr1149
content: Justice for Public Safety Officers Act - Amends the federal criminal code to prohibit and impose enhanced criminal penalties for: (1) killing a federally protected safety officer while such officer is engaged in official duties or on the account of the performance of such duties. And (2) interstate or foreign flight to avoid prosecution, custody, or confinement for killing a federally protected safety officer. Defines federally protected safety officer as a public safety officer for a public agency that receives annual federal assistance of more than $10,000. Includes within the definition of federally protected safety officer judicial officers, law enforcement officers, firefighters, chaplains, and members of a rescue squad or ambulance crew.
